DataElement.preferredDefinition: Measurement of the length, the linear extent in space from one end to the other, of one of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Length, the linear extent in space from one end to the other, of one of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: One of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.:Length; the linear extent in space from one end to the other.

Concepts.definition: The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.
The linear extent in space from one end of something to the other end, or the extent of something from beginning to end.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: GOG CRF:Gynecologic Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for LEVENTHM by script Thu Aug 1 14:43:02 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: Move to caBIG context as teh preferred Rep class for Measurement
